game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must venture into the forgotten ruins deep in the jungle to locate and recover the lost artifact. Beware of the traps and guards that protect it.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magic item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You need to find the hidden entrance among the dense vegetation. Speak with the local villagers for clues.
Navigate a long hallway lined with ancient traps. Use your skills and wits to avoid triggering them.
In the heart of the ruins, a powerful guardian spirit protects the artifact. You must defeat it to claim the artifact.
